resources.string: Please authenticate with your fingerprint now.
Do you wish to cancel or finish the emergency?
There are currently no reports that need to be filled out.
Are you ready to assist in this emergency mission?
Connection to the virtual dispatch center established.
The emergency was cancelled by the control center.
While you are on your way to an emergency, your location is transmitted to the control center.
You received an emergency %1$d minutes ago.
Unfortunately you have not responded to this emergency within %1$d minutes. The emergency has expired for you.
Only activated first responders are allowed to add new AEDs.
The PIN must be 6 digits long
The PIN protects the app from unauthorized usage.
Error loading basic agreement. Please check your internet connection.
The signed basis agreement entitles you to be active as a first responder in many regions of Germany and offer you insurance during your mission.

Sub Agreements are required due to different federal and provincial legislations. With your signature, you unlock additional regions while maintaining the same insurance cover. We encourage you to sign all available agreements.
You are not yet activated as a first responder.
You are activated as an first responder.
You will not be notified in case of an emergency.
You will be notified in case of an emergency.
In order to receive emergencies you must comply with the following requirements:
To establish a communication during an emergency mission the dispatch center requires your full name and phone number.
Upload a photo of your medical certificate. This certificate will be reviewed by an employee before you are activated as a first responder. This can take up to 2 days.
Setup a standby time during you will not be notified about emergencies.
Email or password entered is wrong!
Not registered yet? Do it now
Geben Sie Ihre Zugangsdaten an und laden Sie Ihr Ersthelfer-Zertifikat hoch - danach geht es los.
Click on the year to change it.
Failed to get current location. Make sure your GPS is activated.
Die Leitstelle benötigt die Telefonnummer, um Sie im Notfall kontaktieren zu können.
We sent you an email.\nPlease verify your email address by clicking on the link in the email.
Error loading data. Please check your internet connection.
Error uploading signature. Please try again later.
Error uploading certificate. Please try again later.
Touch-ID offers an alternative authentication option to the PIN.
Alle Einsätze der letzen 30 Tage, inklusive nicht angenommener Einsätze.
GPS is not enabled. Do you want to go to settings menu?
Failed to Retrieve AED Locations. Check you connectivity and try again!
If you setup off duty time, you will not get any alerts.
The sound will play in case of an alarm.
Are you ready to accept the emergency?
Sind Sie in der Lage, bei diesem Einsatz mitzuhelfen?
Please take some minutes for the protocol - this is very important!
Unfortunately, the App was unable to detect when you arrived at the emergency location. Please add this information by yourself.
Relative to the Emergency team arrival time
Spontaneous breathing after clearing of airways
You can chose more than one answer.
Carried out by me and others alternating
Why did you need to cancel the mission?
Please turn on GPS in order to get emergency notifications
I have successfully closed this mission.
I had to cancel the mission.
Carried out by me and others alternating
Please do not add any personal information (name, age, etc.).
In sudden cardiac death, seconds count. \n\nSudden cardiac death is one of the major causes for death.
The First Responder App helps to save lives in the context of sudden cardiac death (SCD) and is one puzzle-part of a bundle of measures against SCD.

Our project lives from the people who are willing to contribute and accept incoming emergencies - be with us and help to save lives! \n\n The more first responders the higher the density and probability to be near a potential Sudden Cardiac Death (SCD).

The application has also a location database for publicly accessible Automated External Defibrillators (AED). Additionally the system has a link to the central European Registry of Cardiac Arrest (EuReCa One) - all cases can be tracked centrally over Europe. \n\n To deliver high standards, everyone of our rescuers needs to fullfill certain standards and / or has to be tranied. Please see our website for further details.
Please sign the basic agreement with your finger
Password must have at least 6 character and must contain at least one number und a capital case letter!
The email address is already registered!
Select one of the options from the list
Something went wrong. The process failed!
Account already exists for this username!
Resuscitation not performed as patient was not reachable
Resuscitation not performed, due to physical condition
Resuscitation not performed, due to other factors
For further analysis pediatric resuscitation measures, all patients younger than 28 days are determined in age categories.
Was a resuscitation already carried out on arrival or for what reasons was the implementation of the resuscitation treatment waived?
Was the cardiac arrest suffered in a school building?
What was the patient\'s consciousness on arrival?
Please specify the kind of breathing after the cardiac arrest occured.
What was the presumed diagnosis that leads to the cardiac arrest?
What was the orientation of the patient when the App-Helper arrived?
Is there any relationship to sport activities?
Who started with the cardiac massage?
After notifying the regular ambulance service, did the dispatch center give a telephone instruction on how to carry out resuscitation measures?
Please specify the total number of given defibrillation shocks. This information is independent of the result.

The common defibrillator types that are used in Germany. If the entry for a used device is missing, please specify it in the free text field in the last step. The data record will then be extended accordingly.
Please specify whether a public or a private defibrillator was used.
Please specify the consciousness of the patient when handed over to the rescue service.
Please specify the consciousness of the patient when handed over to the rescue service.
Please do not enter any personal data like name, age etc. (max 1000)
If you have access to a mobile AED please tell your EmergencyCenter
An email has been sent to reset your password
Something went wrong. Please contact our support
Network unavailable. Please connect to the Internet
Thank you for adding a new AED. After verification we will activate your AED for every first responder
Receive test alarm every Sat 12:00 am
Thank you for signing the agreement.
The agreement has been sent and you won\'t be able to modify it.\n\nIf you have questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
You can also do this step later.
Did not find any email app
Press the button to ask for help in an emergency.
In this state you do not receive emergencies
Pin required to accept the emergency
Enter new pin to access the App
Password and repetition are not equal
Password is not conform to the Guidelines
Your incomplete report was saved. You can reopen it from the start page
The emergency report was successfully sent
Please go to the location of the emergency and provide first aid.
Why do you want to finish the emergency?
Because you accepted the emergency call, you have to fill out an emergency report.
Please set your attendance break times here. In the defined times you don\'t receive emergency calls.
Choose the days when you do not want to receive an emergency call
You don\'t receive emergency calls when being at home.
Please put in a start- and a end time
For the complete activation and qualification examination we need your full address.
With the help of your qualification and profession, the respective dispatch center can send you suiteable emergencies.
Your personal data was saved successfully\n\nYou can always change your profile information.
Incoming emergencies can only be accepted via a secret PIN. This protects against unauthorized access. Please enter 6 numbers.
Select one of the tones from the list
If you want to test emergency now, Press here
Your are going to delete your account. This action can not be undone! Press \'OK\' to proceed
You are going to log out. You can log in later at any time. Press \'OK\' to proceed
Select the days you do not want to receive any emergencies
Do not notify me at home
Please enter your off duty times here. Within these times, you will not receive emergency calls.
You won\'t receive any emergency calls if you are in your home area
Only activated users can test this functionality!

Critical alert will ignore mute and do not disturb mode
Activating notifications enable you to receive the emergency missions.
Please upload a valid proof of your first aid qualification. The evidence should not be older than 2 years.
Select one of the options to send your first Aid Certificate
You have not added any AEDs yet. Please add one by pressing the plus button
(Home Page) Off duty switch is activated
(Standby Mode Page) You have set off duty hours between %1$s and %2$s
(Standby Mode Page) You have set off duty days for %1$s
(Standby Mode Page) You have checked not to notify at home
Press the button below to test emergency now.
You can upload further documents beside your main qualification prove.
Fill address fields with current position
Click to \'Enable\' to enable emergency notifications and \'Disable\' to disable it
App needs location access to send your current position in case of emergency. Without this permission you won\'t be able to accept nor call for emergency through this application
Please reenter your personal PIN to activate it.
Please enter your current pin to set a new one
If you have an account by “Meine Stadt rettet", you can use this to sign in.

In sudden cardiac death seconds count.

Every year numerous people worldwide suffer from sudden cardiac death.
A network of volunteer first-aiders who are additionally alerted by the control center via the app can significantly increase the survival from sudden cardiac death.
The volunteer first aiders need on average only 3–4 minutes to reach the location of the emergency

The rescue workers are alerted in the normal way.

The first aider initiates the first medical care of the patient to reduce the therapy-free incident until the arrival of the rescue workers.

The success of the project depends on the participation of volunteer first responders.

The higher the first responder density in a region the higher the alerting success and survival chance of patient suffering from sudden cardiac death.

Participate to the project and save lives!

In order to ensure the best possible patient care quality, the registered first responders have to provide a prove of their qualification
The agreement authorizes you to use the app in certain regions. The basic agreement determines general user agreement
As a spontaneous helper you voluntarily support aid organisations in difficult times by carrying out certain tasks.
I would like to be notified for the following tasks:
e.g. shopping service, accompaniment to the doctor
e.g. provision of material, registration and care of uninjured persons, drivers
Meine-Stadt-rettet needs your location to send you appropriate emergency calls in your area.
